properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO ,STATION_NO ,COUNT ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,MODIFY_DATE ,DTN_NAME ,D.STATUS ,FILE_PATH||'/'||CHANGE_NAME "TITLE_IMAGE" ,FILE_LEVEL FROM DESTINATION D JOIN UPLOADFILE ON (BOARD_NO = REFD_BNO) WHERE D.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM DESTINATION WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
